release.change: Comparable to Android OS 4.4 and up.
Fix an error in FaceMatch.
Add internet connection detection.
Fix an error: total number of records is incorrect.
Fix a discovered error in FaceMatch.
Add internet connection detection.
Total number of records are incorrect.
Fix error in face search.
Improve: work with mass casualty id without hyphen '-'.
Improve: initialization functions in event detail fragment. So the details of the current event will be initially shown at the begging.
Fixed: error in filter settings for photo selection (with photos only or whatever).
Fixed: error in filter settings for zone (green, yellow, ctc).
Improve event search - add event status: reporting OPEN and reporting CLOSED.
Temporary Disable crop image crash in Android OS 5.1.1 and above.
Add button to check server status on main screen.
Add button to change current event on main screen.
Fix an error in searching, that the first file contain 2 extra images.
Change the display format of time. The new one is "yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss".
Changed: URL end point is replaced by "plus1".
Fixed: Reserved PIDs need to be updated every time when changing hospital
Improved: Better handle when no 3G, WIFI, or connection to seb server. No crash.

Add new feature: automatically generate an PID in report. 1. Has a repository for reserved PIDs; 2. If repository is not empty, take one reserved PIDs; 3. If empty, get a block of reserved PIDs from web server.
Change hospital NLM uuid from 0 to 1. Our web site changed this earlier and caused errors in APP.
Update trademark from '™' to '®'.
Add search function.
Fix the error: send report and does not have uuid returned.
Add view settings.
Add progress bar while download.
Add comments.
Add report abuse.
Add re-report.
Add info view for re-report.
Fix error and remove HomeActivity.
Fix error: switch view in top part does not work.
Fix error: The search order is not right.
Add progress bar display while download.
Add: add codes to make sure the first image is always the primary image.
Add: Latency function in main window.
Fix error: some images do not show up.
Fixed: Latency status icon on main screen are set to gravity center.
Fixed: uuid is incorrect.
Latency indicator is changed. Replace rating stars to new design.
Trademark is updated from '™' to '®'.
Modify manifest file for compatible issues discovered in previous version.
Improved: Face detection of image is a default option. The width of draw line reduced from 3 to 1.
Error fixed: the bitmap file was generated twice.

Changes are made in user-permission in AndroidManifest. This is to try solve a problem: the Google Play Store does not show this app for a few type of tablets, such as Samsung 7" tablet. This could be caused in user permission.
Added a function to generate random names for demo purpose.
Error fixed: Only in tablet and only when to report a new patient, only when the patient ID suffix number reduced to 0, press increase number button will cause exception error.
Error fixed: for tablets, when selecting an empty box (e.g. Outbox), the detail fragment will not get re-flash.
Error fixed: Select hospital does not refresh patient ID prefix in report screen.
Error fixed: Select hospital in tablet mode causes exception error in report screen.
Error fixed: Select event in tablet mode causes exception error in report screen.
Improved: when retrieve the patient file, if a file is damaged, the damaged file will be deleted automatically.
Improved: when failed to find the next ID due the data damaged, this will be detected and a default number will be filled automatically.
Report activities check boxes not lined up.
Add icon button in register screen.
Fix an error in function entering pid suffix number dialogue.
Prefix for patient ID is now default to "NLM" (was "911").
Rearrange the menu items in login activity.
Fix a number of minor errors in login activity when the user choice to quit login.
Take out web server settings in box list fragment. This is to ensure the user will have to logout before change to a new web server.
UI is optimized designed. TriagePic supports multiple size of screens.
Add a function to detect ZXing barcode scanner if is installed. If it is not installed, a function will guild the user to install ZXing barcode scanner.
Overwrite OnBackKeyPress() in both ReportCellActivity and PatientInfoCellActivity. Pressing back key on photo view screen will switch back to the first screen.
Update the launch icon file.
Fix an error in registration.
Remove "cancel" button in login activity.
Remove unused web server in selection. Default to TriageTrak web server.
Remove background image.
Add detection of ZXing Barcode Scanner. If not installed, give the information of download and installation.
Further improve the login and setting procedure.
Improve event selection function. Now, event selection is done in set up function only.
API version upgraded to v33
Add version change history
Create 2 image galleries: one for system; one for cropped images
Improve function crop image
Add comment input
Improve login process
Take off data encryption
API version upgraded to v32
UI changes
Add bar core scanner
